name: Associated.neg_left
initialProofState:
M : Type u_1
inst✝¹ : Monoid M
inst✝ : HasDistribNeg M
a b : M
h : Associated a b
⊢ Associated (Neg.neg a) b
decl: lemma neg_left (h : Associated a b) : Associated (-a) b := let ⟨u, hu⟩ := h; ⟨-u, by simp [hu]⟩

name: Associated.neg_right
initialProofState:
M : Type u_1
inst✝¹ : Monoid M
inst✝ : HasDistribNeg M
a b : M
h : Associated a b
⊢ Associated a (Neg.neg b)
decl: lemma neg_right (h : Associated a b) : Associated a (-b) := h.symm.neg_left.symm

name: Associated.neg_neg
initialProofState:
M : Type u_1
inst✝¹ : Monoid M
inst✝ : HasDistribNeg M
a b : M
h : Associated a b
⊢ Associated (Neg.neg a) (Neg.neg b)
decl: lemma neg_neg (h : Associated a b) : Associated (-a) (-b) := h.neg_left.neg_right
